Title: Expedites MTA capital project construction by establishing a process for utility relocation necessary for such construction
Summary: Expedites MTA capital project improvement, construction, reconstruction, or rehabilitation by establishing a process for utility relocation necessary for such project.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to expediting metropolitan commuter transportation authority capital project construction by establishing a process for utility relocation necessary for such construction
